channel.title: Comments on: Researcher June 24th – “LIFE” Magazine and “Japanese War Bride” film

item.title: By: Shirley Yamaguchi (1920-2014) | Bunnybun's Classic Movie Blog
item.dc:creator: Shirley Yamaguchi (1920-2014) | Bunnybun's Classic Movie Blog
item.description: […] I immediately recognized her name because I still remember parts of the King Vidor directed movie Japanese War Bride, a movie I saw on TV when I was about ten years […]
